title: Introducing: REL
body:
Citing the likes of Lorde, Ellie Goulding and St.

Vincent as inspirations, it’s safe to say that LA teenager **REL** harbours pretty impressive ambitions. Having kicked off a [Kickstarter campaign](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/therealrel/rel-and-the-ep-adventure) to fund her first EP with the release of her debut track, _All That Bite_, it’s perhaps a testament to the quality of the track that she’s already well over halfway to her funding goal. Upbeat and gloriously punchy, it’s clear she knows her way around a hook, and has the attitude to go with it. Check out All That Bite below.
